meanings.sent1: The pot was an earthen creation, molded from clay.
meanings.sent2: The villagers built their houses using earthen materials found nearby.
meanings.sent3: The earthen vase wobbled on the shelf, threatening to fall.
meanings.sent4: Her skin had an earthen hue, resembling the color of rich soil.
meanings.sent5: The smell of rain on the earthen ground filled the air with freshness.

meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of the earth.
meanings.sent1: The ancient ritual had an earthen connection to the land.
meanings.sent2: The artist's paintings often depicted earthen landscapes with vibrant colors.
meanings.sent3: The earthen tones of the room gave it a cozy, natural feel.
meanings.sent4: His voice had an earthen quality, deep and resonant like the earth itself.
meanings.sent5: The earthen scent of pine trees filled the forest, creating a peaceful atmosphere.
